mapper.insert: insert into order_tbl (mem_id, ord_name, ord_zipcode, ord_addr, ord_addr_detail, ord_tel, ord_email, ord_price) values (#{mem_id}, #{ord_name}, #{ord_zipcode}, #{ord_addr}, #{ord_addr_detail}, #{ord_tel}, #{ord_email}, #{ord_price})
insert into ordetail_tbl select #{ord_code}, c.pro_code, c.cart_amount, p.pro_price from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pro_code = p.pro_code where c.mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.select: select ot.ord_code, pt.pro_name, pt.pro_up_folder, pt.pro_img, ot.dt_price, ot.dt_amount, pt2.payment_status from ordetail_tbl ot inner join product_tbl pt on ot.pro_code = pt.pro_code inner join payment_tbl pt2 on pt2.ord_code = ot.ord_code where ot.ord_code = #{ord_code}

select o.ord_code, o.ord_regdate, pt.pro_up_folder, pt.pro_img, pt.pro_name, odt.pro_code, odt.ord_code, odt.dt_price, odt.dt_amount, payt.payment_status, dt.delivery_status from order_tbl o inner join ordetail_tbl odt on o.ord_code = odt.ord_code inner join product_tbl pt on odt.pro_code = pt.pro_code inner join payment_tbl payt on odt.ord_code = payt.ord_code inner join delivery_tbl dt on odt.ord_code = dt.ord_code where o.mem_id = #{mem_id} order by o.ord_regdate desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}

select count(*) from order_tbl o inner join ordetail_tbl odt on o.ord_code = odt.ord_code inner join product_tbl pt on odt.pro_code = pt.pro_code inner join payment_tbl payt on odt.ord_code = payt.ord_code where o.mem_id = #{mem_id}
select ct.cate_name from product_tbl pt inner join category_tbl ct on pt.cate_code = ct.cate_code where pt.pro_code = #{pro_code}

select o.ord_code, o.ord_regdate, pt.pro_up_folder, pt.pro_img, pt.pro_name, odt.pro_code, dt.delivery_date, pt.cate_code from order_tbl o inner join ordetail_tbl odt on o.ord_code = odt.ord_code inner join product_tbl pt on odt.pro_code = pt.pro_code inner join delivery_tbl dt on o.ord_code = dt.ord_code where o.mem_id = #{mem_id} and dt.delivery_status = '배송완료' order by o.ord_code desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}

select count(*) from order_tbl o inner join ordetail_tbl odt on o.ord_code = odt.ord_code inner join product_tbl pt on odt.pro_code = pt.pro_code inner join delivery_tbl dt on o.ord_code = dt.ord_code where o.mem_id = #{mem_id} and dt.delivery_status = '배송완료'

select ot.ord_code, pt.pro_name, pt.pro_code, pt.pro_up_folder, pt.pro_img, ot.dt_amount, ot.dt_price, o.ord_status, o.ord_regdate from order_tbl o inner join ordetail_tbl ot on o.ord_code = ot.ord_code inner join product_tbl pt on ot.pro_code = pt.pro_code where ot.ord_code = #{ord_code}
select payment_id, ord_code, mem_id, payment_method, payment_price, payment_status, payment_date from payment_tbl where ord_code = #{ord_code}
select ord_code, mem_id, ord_name, ord_zipcode, ord_addr, ord_addr_detail, ord_tel, ord_email, ord_price, ord_status, ord_message, ord_regdate from order_tbl where ord_code = #{ord_code}
